data.title: Translation Practice
data.text:
Announcements

! Translation Practice: We meet at my office (Boromrajakumari Building room 1106) on Fridays 4â5 p.m. Bring your translation of the text for that week. Time yourself for 36 minutes and don't use any resources. When you are done, you can look up words and research any information you wish. It may be useful to have a notebook dedicated to this to keep all your notes in one place for easy reference and review.

April 8 Texts:

English-Thai: Organic Architecture (This was on a past scholarship exam. I've also added a bonus summary practice. Try that if you have time.)

Thai Texts on Modern Architecture
